welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pisac, Peru! Prepare to fall in love with our charming city known for its colorful markets, ancient ruins, and stunning mountain views. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pisac has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Velazco Astete Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Velazco Astete Airport handles all domestic flights within Peru.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Velazco Astete Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.
